text: is a Japanese professional football clubJsoccer.com, "Japan J.League Teams" ; retrieved 2012-7-6. in Yahatanishi ward of Kitakyūshū on the island of Kyushu.Soccerway.com, "Giravanz Kitakyushu"; retrieved 2012-3-6. ==History== The club was founded in 1973 as a member of the Kyushu League.RisingSunNews.com, "Girvanz Kitakyushu" ; retrieved 2012-3-6. *1947-2000 Mitsubishi Chemical Kurosaki SC *2001-2009 New Wave Kitakyushu *2010-present Giravanz Kitakyushu ==League position== *2008 : Football League - 10th *2009 : Football League - 4th *2010 : J2 League - 19th *2011 : J2 League - 8th *2012 : J2 League - 9th *2013 : J2 League - 16th *2014 : J2 League - 5th *2015 : J2 League - 7th *2016 : J2 League - 22nd *2017 : J3 League - 9th *2018 : J3 League - 17th *2019 : J3 League - 1st *2020 : J2 League - 5th ==Related pages == * Sports in Japan * List of Japanese football teams * List of Giravanz Kitakyushu players == References == ==Other websites== * Giravanz Kitakyushu website * J.League Club Guide Category:Football clubs in Fukuoka Prefecture
title: Giravanz Kitakyushu
